questionTitle: Which of the following application allows you to collect subscriptions and view them all in one site?

questionOption1: Many Webmail services are free, and the rest are generally modestly priced
questionOption2: Webmail may be differentiated from hosted email by its access through a Web browser

questionExplanation: These services also sometimes use POP3 and IMAP, which allows them to be used to feed email into traditional email clients like Outlook and Thunderbird.

questionTitle: Browser based hosted mail is the prototypical ________ as a Service application.
questionExplanation: Webmail is differentiated from hosted email primarily by the use of browser-based client access.

questionTitle: Which was the first free hosted Webmail service to the user?

questionOption2: Syndication services are a method for publishing content from Websites

questionExplanation: When you subscribe to an RSS feed, you create a bookmark or favorite that is updated automatically as new content appears.
